text: The Academy of Country Music Award for Entertainer of the Year is the biggest competitive category presented at the Academy of Country Music Awards. The following is the list of winners, with the year representing the nominated work. ==Recipients== Six-time winner Garth Brooks Alabama Four-time winner Kenny Chesney Three-time winner Hank Williams Jr. Three-time winners Brooks & Dunn Three-time winner Jason Aldean Two-time winner George Strait Three-time winner Carrie Underwood Two-time winner Toby Keith Loretta Lynn became the first female
